item.title: Haight Travel Guide (San Francisco/Bay Area/California/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Explore Haight, San Francisco's vibrant neighborhood known for its culturally important attractions, scenic natural views, delicious food, and unique shopping spots with our comprehensive travel guide.

Explore the culturally important attractions, natural wonders, hiking and biking routes, food and drink scene, accommodation options, local culture, safety tips, transportation, and nearby destinations.
